oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Discharge paper of Pvt. Joseph I. Mahar
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A Hardin County, Tennessee native, from Coffee Landing less than 10 miles from Shiloh, Pvt. Joseph I. Mahar enlisted in Co. F, 13th Ill. Cav., USA in December 1863 and served in Arkansas until the outfit was disbanded on August 31, 1865. Earlier in the war, he served in the U. S. Navy aboard the U.S.S. Tyler, and took part in the battles of Ft. Henry and Ft. Donelson. After contracting measles, Mahar was discharged from the navy on March 12, 1862.
